name: Science
description: The peer-reviewed journal of the American Association for the Advancement of Science (AAAS), covering all scientific disciplines.
credibility: High credibility with rigorous peer review and minimal editorial bias.

name: Nature
description: Publishes news and articles on a wide range of scientific topics, including groundbreaking research and analysis.
credibility: One of the world's leading multidisciplinary science journals.

name: The Lancet
description: A leading medical journal publishing original research, reviews, and editorials.
credibility: Renowned for its high-impact medical research and comprehensive peer review process.

name: Cell
description: Focuses on publishing research articles in the field of life sciences, including molecular and cell biology.
credibility: Widely respected for its groundbreaking research in biology and medicine.

name: Nature Communications
description: An open-access journal covering all areas of the natural sciences.
credibility: Known for high-quality research articles and open access policy.

name: Science Advances
description: An open-access journal publishing innovative research across all scientific disciplines.
credibility: High standards of peer review and editorial oversight, part of the AAAS journal family.

name: PLOS ONE
description: An inclusive journal community working to advance science for the benefit of society, through the rapid dissemination of research across all areas of science and medicine.
credibility: Known for its inclusive approach and open access policy.

name: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences (PNAS)
description: One of the world's most-cited and comprehensive multidisciplinary scientific journals, publishing high-quality research in all scientific disciplines.
credibility: Highly respected for its rigorous peer review and significant contributions to scientific knowledge.
